title: City Eleusinion at Athens
description: The City Eleusinion was one of the most important sanctuaries in the religious life of ancient Athens.  It was the urban “branch” of the sanctuary of Demeter and Kore at Eleusis in use during the Archaic and Classical periods.

properties.description: Representative location based on a way derived from OpenStreetMap. Chronology following Miles 1998.
properties.title: OSM location of the City Eleusinion
